titles.title: SF242 A New Commandment I give unto you

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
A new commandment I give unto you:
that you love one another as I have loved you,
that you love one another as I have loved you
By this the world shall sknow that you are my disciples,
if you have love one with each other.
By the world shall know that you are my disciples,
if you have love one for another.
